title: hari amsanEy
sahitya:
hari amsanE hara vamsanE

hari hara sutanE ayyanE meyyanE

(hari)

anupallavi

karuNAntarangam kanindE negizhndiDum

saraNa aravindam paNNisaiyODasaindiDum

(hari)

caraNam

bhavarOga pAsAdibhanda

nivAraNam tanda vivida kAranA

avatAranE tavakkolanE

yuva rati pati priya rAga mOhana (hari)
